mods.abstract: The California Magazine of Western Square and Round Dancing by the Square Dancers of Southern California. This edition includes a table of contents which lists the following: SQUARE DANCES "Charley, My Boy", "Old Soft Shoe", and "The Skater's Waltz". SPECIAL FEATURES "Square Dancer's Johnny Appleseed", "Corner of the Square", "New Color Movie Tells the Square Dance Story", "Why Attend an Institute?", and "How Olde are You, Square Dancer?". REGULAR FEATURES "Help! For the Square Dancer", "The Caller's Notebook", "Events Seen Thru the Square Dancer's Eye", "On Tour with Terry", "'Round the Outside Ring", "On the Record", "The Green Sheet", "From the Floor", "Calendar of Square Dancing Events", "The Square of the Month: Hunter and Jeri Crosby", and "As I See It".
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
